definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The influence of different doping methods on the superconductivity and structure of BSCCO superconductor was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 比較了不同摻雜方法對超導體結構以及性能的影響。

sentences.english: Another new class of superconductors, based on iron instead of copper, was discovered a couple of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 而幾年前又發現用鐵代替銅的新型超導體。

sentences.english: The room temperature superconductor has been the "snark" of modern materials science...
sentences.chinese: 常溫超導體早已成爲現代科學材料中的奢侈品。

sentences.english: Superconductors carry electricity with no loss to resistance.
sentences.chinese: 超導體能沒有任何電阻地帶電。

sentences.english: Reasearch for the new process of super-fine superconductor ceramic powders by chemical synthesis is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超細超導體瓷料用化學合成法試製的新工藝。

sentences.english: Recent developments concerning the electronic phase diagram of high temperature superconductors(HTS) are presented.
sentences.chinese: 要介紹了高溫超導體的電子態相圖及最近的一些發展。

sentences.english: This new class of materials involves copper-oxygen planes.
sentences.chinese: 高溫超導體多是銅氧相物質。
